devdoc.author: Andrei Budoi
devdoc.details: Should try to change most strings into bytes32 sometime

params._choiceNames: Array of Names or descriptions of proposals.

params._voterArray: The voters' wallet addresses and names

params._voteCommit: Encrypted vote with the format "[No. of choice]-[password]"

endVote().details: Should add a way to check for ties and handle them accordingly.

params._choiceNumber: Index of your picked choice. Must match with _vote's [No. of choice]
params._vote: Your decrypted vote with the format "[No. of choice]-[password]". Must match _voteCommit if encrypted with keccak256.

devdoc.title: Commit Reveal Voting Scheme

addChoices(string[]).notice: Adds new choices to vote for

addVoters((address,string)[]).notice: Register a voter. Must have a name or id and it shouldn't be already registered.

commitVote(bytes32).notice: !!!! The array of choices is indexed from 0   !!!! Votes must be encrypted using Keccak-256https://emn178.github.io/online-tools/keccak_256.htmlExample: "2-yogurt" (picked third option with "yogurt" as a password) will be encrypted and sent as "0xedf92158c3f1170092fb3b3f15ff96adf2ee73ea0c92d07d2dfc84612938abf9"!!!! No two hashes can be the same in a poll. A hash must be unique

constructor.notice: Setup the owner of the contract and its description

endVote().notice: Ends the vote. Committed votes cannot be revealed anymore

getChoices().notice: Returns the list of choices for frontend

userdoc.notice: Votes must be encrypted using keccak256
